page.title: 17Tourism
page.content: Tourism has always been a feature of {Montrose.}Tourists have a wide range of accommodation available-hotels, boarding houses,caravan or camping sites. {Montrose}is ideally situated as a touring centre for Glamis,Brechin and Edzell Castles and the picturesque Glens of Prosen,Clova and Doll.The local Tourist Office has leaflets, maps and booklets on{Montrose.}The booklet "What's on in Montrose" is published by Angus District Council's Tourist Department and is a helpful guide to any tourist. The town has many facilities for the tourist:Golf Courses,Swimming Pool, Sports Centre,Tennis Courts,Pitch and Putt Courses,Outdoor Trampolines, Amusement Arcade,Bowling Greens,Beach, Museum,Stables Art Museum and William Lamb Memorial Studio.
